description: Use your favourite store bought pesto to make this speedy fettuccine with juicy chicken thighs.
name: Pesto Chicken Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to the boil and cook the fettuccine according to pack instructions and drain, reserving a couple of tablespoons of starchy water.
Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the chicken for 5 minutes, stirring, add the broccoli and lemon juice and zest and cook for 2-3 minutes. Stir in the pesto.
Tip the fettuccine into the pan and toss to coat, adding starchy water as necessary. Stir in the rocket, top with parmesan and serve.
